title: Cristiano Ronaldo Extends Al Nassr Contract Until 2027

New Delhi, June 26
Cristiano Ronaldo has ended months of speculation over his club's future by signing a contract extension with Al Nassr that will keep him at the Saudi Arabian club until 2027.
